TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供資料給 控制項的 和 事件。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理並實作虛擬模式中的事件控制項。Handle the and events to implement virtual mode in the control. 如需有關虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理更新和新的項目儲存在資料存放區物件的事件。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

Public Sub New (columnIndex As Integer, rowIndex As Integer)

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 包含發生該事件的儲存格之資料行索引。

span.span: The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 包含發生該事件的儲存格之資料列索引。

span.span: The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnIndex As Integer
public: property int ColumnIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出發生事件之儲存格的資料行索引。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the column index of the cell that the event occurs for.

value.span: 包含發生該事件的儲存格之資料行索引。

span.span: The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此位移来參考發生該事件的資料格屬性。Use this offset with the property to reference the cell that the event occurs for. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以從資料存放區擷取資料格的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve cell values from the data store. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#120)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowIndex As Integer
public: property int RowIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出發生事件之儲存格的資料列索引。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the row index of the cell that the event occurs for.

value.span: 包含發生該事件的儲存格之資料列索引。

span.span: The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此位移来參考發生該事件的資料格屬性。Use this offset with the property to reference the cell that the event occurs for. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理更新和新的項目儲存在資料存放區物件的事件。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Value : obj with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定發生該事件之儲存格的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要檢查儲存格的值時處理事件，或通訊儲存格的目前值，如果建立事件，請使用這個屬性。Use this property to inspect the cell's value when handling an event, or to communicate the cell's current value if creating an event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理更新和新的項目儲存在資料存放區物件的事件。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]
